title.narrative: Secure Poultry, Egg, Turkey/1 Health collab, 1st Intnl Farm to Fork Sympsm

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award Following up on previous meetings where HPAI was delivered, APHIS IS attended the Food Safety Symposium in Chile to deliver a presentation on ways the U.S. government, States, industry, and academia collaborate to achieve common goals in avian health. The presentation included examples of the NPIP, and the Secure Food Supply..

participating-org.narrative: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service
The federal government of the United States

participating-org.usg:office-name: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Chile is a regional strategic partner in peacekeeping activities, training both civilian and military personnel from Latin America at its peacekeeping training center and attaching peacekeeping platoons from other countries to its own large and professional force. U.S. assistance will support Chile's efforts to modernize and enhance its military's capacity to participate in regional security and peacekeeping operations, and increase interoperability with U.S. forces. U.S. assistance will also help to combat the spread of weapons of mass destruction and the transfer of dangerous contraband as Chile develops a comprehensive export control system that meets international standards. Additionally, U.S. assistance will support technical exchanges and training relevant to the establishment and enforcement of export control laws.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Salaries and Expenses, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Agriculture
